thread.title: USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave
thread.title_full: USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave

title: USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave
text:
> Sports USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave FILE - In this Sept. 12, 2015, file photo, Southern California head coach Steve Sarkisian watch his team warm up before an NCAA college football game against Idaho in Los Angeles. USC fired Sarkisian one day after the troubled coach was put on leave. Athletic director Pat Haden announced his decision Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in a brief statement. (AP Photo/Gus Ruelas, File)
